Jeff Salisbury.content: Remember, as the legendary motorcycle racer Valentino Rossi once said, 'Riding a race bike is an art - a thing that you do because you feel something inside.' So, feel the road and enjoy the art of riding!

Technical Fact: Did you know that motorcycle engines are precision-tuned machines that can have up to 20,000 individual parts working together seamlessly? The engineering behind these powerhouses is truly remarkable!
Riding tip: Practice 'countersteering' by pushing on the right handlebar to turn right. It's a fundamental skill that can enhance your control and confidence while riding!
